name: Boardea integration
author: Boardea

sections.description:
Plugin integrates Boardea.com video storyboards with WordPress

Plugin filters out URLs of YouTube videos and adds links to video storyboard (+ basic statistics) generated by Boardea.com. No more plain links to videos you have no idea what they are about.

The plugin makes no permanent changes to the content (it does make no change to the database).

See demo here.

Bug reports

Bug reports are welcomed over classic WordPress plugin support page or directly over Boardea contact form.
sections.faq:
Does your plugin store anything in database?

No, it doesn’t. All is generated on the fly. Plugin makes no permanent changes to the content.

Where can I see a demo?

Demo is available here.

Where developers can find more info?

Basic info for developers is here.
